chunk: Ingredients: Prunus Amygdalus Dulcis Oil, Vitis Vinifera Seed Oil, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Coco-Caprylate, Cocos Nucifera Oil, Macadamia Integrifolia Seed Oil, Cannabis Sativa Seed Oil, Corylus Avellana Seed Oil, Helianthus Annuus Seed Oil, CANNABIS SATIVA (HEMP) FLOWER/LEAF/STEM EXTRACT, Tocopherol, Rhodiola Rosea Root Extract, Rosmarinus
book: 0395-Juana Skin Face Oil, Zen Me Out

chunk: Seed Oil, Cannabis Sativa Seed Oil, Corylus Avellana Seed Oil, Helianthus Annuus Seed Oil, CANNABIS SATIVA (HEMP) FLOWER/LEAF/STEM EXTRACT, Tocopherol, Rhodiola Rosea Root Extract, Rosmarinus Officinalis Leaf Extract.

chunk:
Directions: Gently apply 2-3 drops on cleansed skin, or blend 1-2 drops to the daily dose of your favorite skincare
products for extra hydration and stress relief.
book: 0395-Juana Skin Face Oil, Zen Me Out

chunk: Warnings: : for external use only. Do not use on damanged or broken skin. If contact with eyes, rinse with water to remove. Keep out of reach of children. Keep away from heat and direct sunlight.
book: 0395-Juana Skin Face Oil, Zen Me Out
